Global and Transcultural Images and Screen Studies Interaction and Social Processes Persuasion and Politics Technology and Society              MCC-UE 1700 - Gender and Communication        This course explores the ways people create, maintain, and augment the meaning of gender, developing insight into understanding gender ideology and the media representation of gender. The course examines how ideas about gender shape our communication practices, and how our practices of communication produce gender.
